overview: Four actors go down the Magdalena River with the purpose of locating the scenes in which a play will take place. It seeks to narrate the story of a sentimental relationship established in 1812 between Simón Bolívar, then 28 years old, and Ana Lenoit, a 17-year-old Frenchwoman, living with her parents in a small town on the banks of the Magdalena.
title: Ana Lenoit
